blocks.content: Extend class notation with (arbitrary) complete graphs.
blocks.origin: const class ccplgr { ComplGraph }

ccusgr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with complete simple graphs.
blocks.origin: const class ccusgr { ComplUSGraph }

blocks.name: diff.ccusgr.s
diff.ccusgr.c
diff.ccusgr.w
df-cplgr
blocks.content: Define the class of all complete "graphs". A class/graph is called _complete_ if every pair of distinct vertices is connected by an edge, i.e., each vertex has all other vertices as neighbors or, in other words, each vertex is a universal vertex. (Contributed by AV, 24-Oct-2020.) (Revised by TA, 15-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: df-cusgr
blocks.content: Define the class of all complete simple graphs. A simple graph is called _complete_ if every pair of distinct vertices is connected by a (unique) edge, see definition in section 1.1 of [Diestel] p. 3. In contrast, the definition in section I.1 of [Bollobas] p. 3 is based on the size of (finite) complete graphs, see ~ cusgrsize . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 24-Oct-2020.) (Revised by BJ, 14-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: cplgruvtxb
blocks.content: A graph ` G ` is complete iff each vertex is a universal vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 15-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: prcliscplgr
blocks.content: A proper class (representing a null graph, see ~ vtxvalprc ) has the property of a complete graph (see also ~ cplgr0v ), but cannot be an element of ` ComplGraph ` , of course. Because of this, a sethood antecedent like ` G e. W ` is necessary in the following theorems like ~ iscplgr . (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: iscplgr
blocks.content: The property of being a complete graph. (Contributed by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscplgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, ccplgr), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ccplgr), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0))), wceq(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c2))
  cplgruvtxb(c0, c1, c2)
  bitri(wceq(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0))), wa(wss(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c2), wss(c2, cfv(cuvtx, c0))))
  eqss(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c2)
  mpbiran(wa(wss(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c2), wss(c2, cfv(cuvtx, c0))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0))), wss(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c2))
  uvtxssvtx(c0, c2)
  anbi2i(wss(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c2), wss(c2, cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0))))
  dfss3(s0, c2, cfv(cuvtx, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuvtx, c0)
  diff.cuvtx.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscplgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ComplGraph ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà ComplGraph, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)), (UnivVtx ` c0)= c2)
  cplgruvtxb(c0, c1, c2)
  bitri((UnivVtx ` c0)= c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)), ((UnivVtx ` c0)‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ(UnivVtx ` c0)))
  eqss((UnivVtx ` c0), c2)
  mpbiran(((UnivVtx ` c0)‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ(UnivVtx ` c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)), (UnivVtx ` c0)‚äÜ c2)
  uvtxssvtx(c0, c2)
  anbi2i((UnivVtx ` c0)‚äÜ c2, c2 ‚äÜ(UnivVtx ` c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)))
  dfss3(s0, c2, (UnivVtx ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuvtx, c0)
  diff.cuvtx.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iscplgrnb
blocks.content: A graph is complete iff all vertices are neighbors of all vertices. (Contributed by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscplgrnb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, ccplgr), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ccplgr), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0))))
  iscplgr(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  ralbidva(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))
  baibd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))))
  uvtxel(s1, cv(s0), c0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscplgrnb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ComplGraph ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà ComplGraph, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)))
  iscplgr(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  ralbidva(s0, c2, c0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)))
  baibd(c0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, (s0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)‚Üî(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)))))
  uvtxel(s1, s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: iscplgredg
blocks.content: A graph ` G ` is complete iff all vertices are connected with each other by (at least) one edge. (Contributed by AV, 10-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))

  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)

  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, ccplgr), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ccplgr), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))))))
  iscplgrnb(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  ralbidva(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))
  ralbidva(s1, cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wb(w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))))
  df-3an(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))), w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))))
  nbgrel(s2, cv(s1), c0, cv(s0), c2, c3)
  biantrurd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wrex(s2, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  sylan2b(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  eldifsn(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))

  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))

  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

  a1i(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚àß s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 })), (((s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚àß s1 ‚â† s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c3, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2))‚Üî(((s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚àß s1 ‚â† s0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c3, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2))))
  df-3an((s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), s1 ‚â† s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c3, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2))
  a1i(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚àß s1 ‚àà(c2 \ { s0 })), (s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)‚Üî((s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚àß s1 ‚â† s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c3, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2))))
  nbgrel(s2, s1, c0, s0, c2, c3)

blocks.name: iscusgr
blocks.content: The property of being a complete simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: cusgrusgr
blocks.content: A complete simple graph is a simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 13-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: cusgrcplgr
blocks.content: A complete simple graph is a complete graph. (Contributed by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: iscusgrvtx
blocks.content: A simple graph is complete iff all vertices are uniuversal. (Contributed by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: cusgruvtxb
blocks.content: A simple graph is complete iff the set of vertices is the set of universal vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: iscusgredg
blocks.content: A simple graph is complete iff all vertices are connected by an edge. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)

thm iscusgredg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, ccplgr)))

  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, ccplgr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2))))

  iscplgrnb(s0, s1, c0, cusgr, c1)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2))
  nbusgreledg(c0, cv(s1), cv(s0), c2)

thm iscusgredg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph, (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2))), (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c0 ‚àà ComplGraph))
  iscusgr(c0)
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c0 ‚àà ComplGraph, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2)))
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c0 ‚àà ComplGraph, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))))
  iscplgrnb(s0, s1, c0, cusgr, c1)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c1, (c1 \ { s0 }), c0 ‚àà USGraph, s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2)
  nbusgreledg(c0, s1, s0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s1)
}

blocks.content: In a complete simple graph, the edges are all the pairs of different vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: cplgr2v
blocks.content: An undirected hypergraph with two (different) vertices is complete iff there is an edge between these two vertices. (Contributed by AV, 3-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: nbcplgr
blocks.content: In a complete graph, each vertex has all other vertices as neighbors. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 3-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: cusgr3vnbpr
blocks.content: The neighbors of a vertex in a simple graph with three elements are unordered pairs of the other vertices if and only if the graph is complete. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 5-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cedg, c6))
  -| wceq(cfv(cvtx, c6), ctp(c0, c2, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cvtx, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)

  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c6, cusgr), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))), wb(wcel(c6, ccplgr), wral(s0, c7, wrex(s1, c7, wrex(s2, cdif(c7, csn(cv(s1))), wceq(co(c6, cnbgr, cv(s0)), cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c8))

  bitrd(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c6, cusgr), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))), wcel(c6, ccplgr), wral(s0, c7, wrex(s1, c7, wrex(s2, cdif(c7, csn(cv(s1))), wceq(co(c6, cnbgr, cv(s0)), cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), w3a(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), c8), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c8), wcel(cpr(c4, c0), c8)))
  syl3an2(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c6, cusgr), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4)), wb(wcel(c6, ccplgr), w3a(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), c8), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c8), wcel(cpr(c4, c0), c8))), wcel(c6, cupgr))
  usgrupgr(c6)
  cplgr3v(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c8)
  nb3grpr(s0, s1, s2, c0, c2, c8, c4, c7, c6, c1, c3, c5, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c6, cusgr), w3a(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))))

  diff.wcel.s(s1, c4, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c6, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s1)
  diff.w3a.s(s1, wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4))

blocks.name: cusgrexi
blocks.content: An arbitrary set ` V ` regarded as set of vertices together with the set of pairs of elements of this set regarded as edges is a complete simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 5-Nov-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)

thm cusgrexi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)), ccusgr))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {

blocks.name: cusgrexg
blocks.content: For each set there is a set of edges so that the set together with these edges is a complete simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 5-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: cffldtocusgr
blocks.content: The field of complex numbers can be made a complete simple graph with the set of pairs of complex numbers regarded as edges. This theorem demonstrates the capabilities of the current definitions for graphs applied to extensible structures. (Contributed by AV, 14-Nov-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 17-Nov-2021.)

blocks.name: cusgrsizeinds
blocks.content: Part 1 of induction step in ~ cusgrsize . The size of a complete simple graph with ` n ` vertices is ` ( n - 1 ) ` plus the size of the complete graph reduced by one vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cusgrsizeinds(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), co(co(cfv(chash, c1), cmin, nat1), caddc, cfv(chash, c4))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s0, c3, wnel(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpdan(w3a(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), co(co(cfv(chash, c1), cmin, nat1), caddc, cfv(chash, c4))), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), cfn))
  3imp(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), cfn))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wi(wcel(c1, cfn), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), cfn))), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  ex(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), cfn)))

blocks.name: cusgrsize2inds
blocks.content: Induction step in ~ cusgrsize . If the size of the complete graph with ` n ` vertices reduced by one vertex is " ` ( n - 1 ) ` choose 2", the size of the complete graph with ` n ` vertices is " ` n ` choose 2". (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: cusgrsize
blocks.content: The size of a finite complete simple graph with ` n ` vertices ( ` n e. NN0 ` ) is ` ( n _C 2 ) ` (" ` n ` choose 2") resp. ` ( ( ( n - 1 ) * n ) / 2 ) ` , see definition in section I.1 of [Bollobas] p. 3 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: cusgrfi
blocks.content: If the size of a complete simple graph is finite, then its order is also finite. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 13-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 11-Nov-2020.)

thm cusgrfi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cedg, c0))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, cfn))
  con4d(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, cfn))
  com12(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wn(wcel(c2, cfn)), wn(wcel(c1, cfn)))
  exlimddv(hs0, wn(wcel(c2, cfn)), wi(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfielex(hs0, c2)
  mpd(wa(wn(wcel(c2, cfn)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wn(wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn)))
  biimpac(wn(wcel(c2, cfn)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn)))
  notbid(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn))
  cusgrfilem3(hs3, hs1, cv(hs0), c2, crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), c0, cmpt(hs3, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs3, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wn(wcel(c2, cfn)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wn(wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn)), wi(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wn(wcel(c1, cfn)))))
  com23(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn)), wcel(c0, ccusgr), wn(wcel(c1, cfn)))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c0, ccusgr), wi(wn(wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn)), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wn(wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn)), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wss(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfv(cedg, c0)))
  cusgrfilem1(hs3, hs1, c0, cv(hs0), c2, crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))))
  cbvrabv(hs2, hs3, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs3), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  rexbidv(hs1, c2, wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs3), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs3), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  con3d(wss(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  syl5bi(wss(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), cfn))
  eleq1i(c1, cfn, cfv(cedg, c0))
  expcom(wss(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), cfn), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), cfn))
  ssfi(cfv(cedg, c0), crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(c2, cfn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, ccusgr), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(crab(hs2, cpw(c2), wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))))
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs3.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs2.w(wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs3), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs3.w(wrex(hs1, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))
}

thm cusgrfi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin)‚Üí c2 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Edg ` c0)
} = {
  imp(c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph, c1 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà Fin)
  con4d(c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph, c1 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà Fin)
  com12(c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà Fin, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin)
  exlimddv(hs0, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà Fin, (c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph ‚Üí ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  nfielex(hs0, c2)
  mpd((¬¨ c2 ‚àà Fin ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph ‚Üí ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin), ¬¨ { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin)
  biimpac(¬¨ c2 ‚àà Fin, hs0 ‚àà c2, ¬¨ { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin)
  notbid(hs0 ‚àà c2, c2 ‚àà Fin, { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin)
  cusgrfilem3(hs3, hs1, hs0, c2, { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))}, c0, (hs3 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs0 })‚Ü¶ { hs3, hs0 }))
  eqid((hs3 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs0 })‚Ü¶ { hs3, hs0 }))
  adantl(¬¨ c2 ‚àà Fin, hs0 ‚àà c2, (¬¨ { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph ‚Üí ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin)))
  com23(hs0 ‚àà c2, ¬¨ { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin, c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin)
  expcom(hs0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph, (¬¨ { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin ‚Üí ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin))
  syl((c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (¬¨ { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin ‚Üí ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin), { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0))
  cusgrfilem1(hs3, hs1, c0, hs0, c2, { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))})
  cbvrabv(hs2, hs3, P(c2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 })), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs3 = { hs1, hs0 })))
  rexbidv(hs1, c2, hs2 = hs3, (hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }), (hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs3 = { hs1, hs0 }))
  anbi2d(hs2 = hs3, hs1 ‚â† hs0, hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }, hs3 = { hs1, hs0 })
  eqeq1(hs2, hs3, { hs1, hs0 })
  con3d({ hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0), { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà Fin)
  syl5bi({ hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0), c1 ‚àà Fin, { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin, (Edg ` c0)‚àà Fin)
  eleq1i(c1, cfn, (Edg ` c0))
  expcom({ hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚äÜ(Edg ` c0), (Edg ` c0)‚àà Fin, { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))} ‚àà Fin)
  ssfi((Edg ` c0), { hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))})
  diff.hs0.w(¬¨ c2 ‚àà Fin)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà ComplUSGraph ‚Üí ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.c(hs0)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c({ hs2 ‚àà P(c2)| ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 }))})
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(P(c2))
  diff.hs3.c(P(c2))
  diff.hs2.w(‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs3 = { hs1, hs0 })))
  diff.hs3.w(‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚â† hs0 ‚àß hs2 = { hs1, hs0 })))
  diff.hs1.w(hs2 = hs3)
}

blocks.name: usgredgsscusgredg
blocks.content: A simple graph is a subgraph of a complete simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 13-Nov-2020.)

thm usgredgsscusgredg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, ccusgr)), wss(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c1))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, c2, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, ccusgr)))
  impancom(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, ccusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wcel(c1, ccusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wrex(hs1, c4, wrex(hs2, c4, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  usgredg(hs1, hs2, c0, cv(hs0), c2, c4)
  rexlimivv(hs1, hs2, c4, c4, wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wi(wcel(c1, ccusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4)), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wi(wcel(c1, ccusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  syl5bi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4)), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wcel(c1, ccusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(c1, cusgr), wral(hs4, c4, wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs4))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), c3)))))
  iscusgredg(hs4, hs3, c1, c4, c3)
  adantld(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4)), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wcel(c1, cusgr), wral(hs4, c4, wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs4))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  impl(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wi(wral(hs4, c4, wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs4))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  syl9(wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c4), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wral(hs4, c4, wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs4))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c3)))
  rspcv(hs4, cv(hs1), c4, wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs4))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), c3)), wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c3)))
  raleqbidv(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs4))), cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs4), cv(hs1)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), c3), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c3))
  difeq2d(c4, csn(cv(hs4)), csn(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs4), cv(hs1)))
  sneq(cv(hs4), cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), c3, cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs4), cv(hs1)))
  preq2(cv(hs4), cv(hs1), cv(hs3))
  syld(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c4), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), c3))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c4), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wi(wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c3)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), c3)), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1)))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c4), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c4), wne(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  anim2i(wcel(cv(hs2), c4), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wne(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  necomd(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), wa(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  simpl(wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  eldifsn(cv(hs2), c4, cv(hs1))
  rspcv(hs3, cv(hs2), cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c3), wcel(cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), c3))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c3, cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs3), cv(hs2)))
  preq1(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), cv(hs1))
  ad2antll(wcel(cv(hs2), c4), wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wi(wcel(cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), c3, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  sylbb(wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wceq(cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  eqeq2i(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  prcom(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, ccusgr)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wcel(c1, ccusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  diff.hs2.w(wi(wcel(c1, ccusgr), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs4.c(c1)
  diff.hs4.c(c4)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c4)
  diff.hs4.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs4.w(wral(hs3, cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c3)))
  diff.hs3.w(wceq(cv(hs4), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs2))
  diff.hs3.c(cdif(c4, csn(cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs3.w(wcel(cpr(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), c3))
}

thm usgredgsscusgredg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà ComplUSGraph)‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Vtx ` c1)

blocks.name: usgrsscusgr
blocks.content: A simple graph is a subgraph of a complete simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 13-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgrsscusgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, ccusgr)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, ccusgr)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, ccusgr)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, ccusgr)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wss(c2, c3))
  usgredgsscusgredg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  dfss5(s0, s1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: fusgrmaxsize
blocks.content: The maximum size of a finite simple graph with ` n ` vertices is ` ( ( ( n - 1 ) * n ) / 2 ) ` . See statement in section I.1 of [Bollobas] p. 3 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 13-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 14-Nov-2020.)

  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cbc, nat2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))

} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cbc, nat2)), wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  isfusgr(c0, c2)
  exlimddv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c2, cfn)), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cbc, nat2)), wcel(cop(c2, cv(hs0)), ccusgr))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c2, cfn), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(c2, cv(hs0)), ccusgr)))
  cusgrexg(hs0, c2, cfn)

  adantlr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(cop(c2, cv(hs0)), ccusgr), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, cfv(chash, cfv(cedg, cop(c2, cv(hs0))))))
  sizusglecusg(c0, cop(c2, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cedg, cop(c2, cv(hs0))), c2)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c2, cfn)), wcel(cop(c2, cv(hs0)), ccusgr), wi(wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, cfv(chash, cfv(cedg, cop(c2, cv(hs0))))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cbc, nat2))))

  expcom(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(cop(c2, cv(hs0)), ccusgr), wi(wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, cfv(chash, cfv(cedg, cop(c2, cv(hs0))))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cbc, nat2))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cop(c2, cv(hs0)), ccusgr), wcel(c2, cfn)), wi(wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, cfv(chash, cfv(cedg, cop(c2, cv(hs0))))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cbc, nat2))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cedg, cop(c2, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(chash, c2), cbc, nat2)))
  cusgrsize(cop(c2, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cedg, cop(c2, cv(hs0))))

  breq2(cfv(chash, cfv(cedg, cop(c2, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(chash, c2), cbc, nat2), cfv(chash, c1), cle)
